name: Breaking Greg
description:
Greg Stanley has finally had enough. The monotony of his daily cooperate grind has come to a head, cant hold it in any longer.

The prototype is meant to be played using a controller, keyboard and mouse will work however the experience may vary

Credits:

Design: Euan Wynne-Jones, Jackson Hole, Jared Threadgold,

Art: Flynn Eickhoff, Jasmine Wang, Heather Barnett,

Programming:  Blake Page, and Like Stanbridge
